task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Innovatech Solutions: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: Innovatech Solutions is exploring the possibility of offering a mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break program. This short survey will help us gauge employee interest and preferences to ensure the program meets your needs. Your feedback is valuable and will help us shape the program effectively.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15-20 minute guided Mindfulness & Stretching Break during the workday?
What time of day would be most convenient for you to participate in a Mindfulness & Stretching Break?
What is your preferred method of delivery for the Mindfulness & Stretching Break?
What type of mindfulness and stretching exercises are you most interested in?
Do you have any physical limitations or concerns that we should be aware of when designing the program?
Would you prefer the sessions to be led by an internal employee or an external instructor?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: To improve participant satisfaction, Innovatech Solutions should focus on increasing the number of prize categories and enhancing the functionality of the mobile app for the Step Challenge.
